input.sentences: as she got ready | she thought of how hard she worked for this day .

output.sentences: Dylan was thoughtful as he prepared for the graduation.
The procession begins with a march to the stage.
The Dean of academics welcomes the new graduates.
The ceremony was long and filled with many speaches.
Dylan was proud and relieved once he accepted his achievement.
